events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further evaluation.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to oversee your application process.
The initial screening for your Software Engineer position application was completed successfully.
Thank you for your prompt response to our screening questions, we appreciate your engagement.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10 AM UTC with our engineering team.
You successfully completed the technical interview and demonstrated strong software development skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 2 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
